titleStmt.title: Celestial amities: or, A soul sighing for the love of her saviour. By Edward Reynell, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Reynell, Edward, 1612-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Abel Roper, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Sun over against S. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
